events_with_choices.name: 提案ッ！新曲プロデュース！
あなたと私をつなげるライブ

effects: If Smart Falcon is scenario-linked: Full Speed Ahead! hint +1
If not scenario-linked: At Full Speed hint +1

If Silence Suzuka is scenario-linked: Trackblazer hint +1
If not scenario-linked: Rosy Outlook hint +1

If not scenario-linked: All That There Is hint +1
